General.Name: Citic Offshore Helicopter Co Ltd
General.Description: CITIC Offshore Helicopter Co., Ltd. operates in aviation industry in China. The company is involved in the offshore oil, emergency rescue, navigation maintenance, offshore wind power, and land navigation activities. It has a fleet of 86 helicopters. The company was formerly known as China National Offshore Helicopter Professional Company. CITIC Offshore Helicopter Co., Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
